section.name: General
section.instruction: Use the keyboard arrows to move around. Pressing ESC on the home screen closes the game, as does clicking the x button. The game is played using the keyboard arrow keys and the game is paused with the SPACE key. Good luck and have fun!

section.name: Standard Mode
section.instruction: Good old classic snake game. Hit the outside wall, you die. Hit yourself, you die. Eat an apple, you grow.

section.name: Walls Mode
section.instruction: Basically standard mode but now with walls spawned randomly when an apple is eaten. Hit the random wall, you die!

section.name: Poison Mode
section.instruction: Continues building on the "Walls Mode" by expanding the game to now also spawn poisoned apples. Eat a poisoned apple, guess what? You die!

section.name: Future Modes
section.instruction: Memory mode. The obsticles are shown for a few ticks before disapearing and you have to rememeber where they were. The apples is still present though! And as usual hit the invisible osbsticle, you die!
